nodes.text: The Breshkall system was situated in the Outer Rim Territories' Khuiumin sector. It was the site of Breshkall, a hidden base used by the Twi'lek arms dealer Prengahl Kreen, who operated in the Hook Nebula's Empartheca system during the Galactic Civil War. Kreen did not do business at Breshkall, instead using it as a refuge and home for his family, friends, servants, and trusted associates. The base was rumored to be a floating fortress, and uninvited visitors were not welcome there.
The Breshkall system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-19.
